interactivity.requirements: 15 Ami Affection You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen " Back Out in the Heat " from Ami Arakawa
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Visit Ami's room on any weekend morning after all Requirements have been fulfilled.

progression.synopsis: Sensei spends the whole day hanging out with Ami at home. They talk about their relationship, with Ami extracting a statement of love from Sensei by threatening to stop cooking for him. She tells Sensei that he's "putting roadblocks all over this relationship" by being older than her and related to her. They spend nearly the entire day watching anime together, and Sensei reflects on how good a life he has. Afterwards, Sensei takes a bath. If Sensei has fingered Ami before, she joins him and they have sex â€” otherwise, he just naps until dinner.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.6.
